diff_act: 7.enter train data automatically using pre-defined settings
9.entering train data automatically from a pre-defined database or external source

regen.absent_element: indication of successful data entry and storage
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an indication to the driver that train data has been successfully entered and stored in the ETCS equipment.

regen.absent_element: validation of train data after automatic entry
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate train data after automatic entry to ensure consistency and accuracy before allowing train movement.

regen.absent_element: validation of train data before allowing train movement
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate the entered train data to ensure completeness and correctness before allowing train movement.

label: The driver shall be able to consult train data when the train is stationary or moving.
absence: action of consulting train data when moving
